item.title: 2023-07-31 Nomos weekly
item.description: Nomos 31st July [Network implementation and Mixnet]: Research Initial analysis on the mixnet Proof of Concept (PoC) was performed, assessing components like Sphinx for packets and delay-forwarder.

item.title: 2023-07-24 Nomos weekly
item.description: Research Milestone 1: Understanding Data Availability (DA) Problem High-level exploration and discussion on data availability problems in a collaborative offsite meeting in Paris.
